bibl.title: The Berlin 'Chronicle' (P.Berol. inv. 13296): A New Edition of the Earliest Extant Late Antique Consularia.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 13296 (= M.-P.3 2243; LDAB 5767). - Introduction. - The Place of P.Berol. inv. 13296 in the Late Antique Chronicle Traditions. - Description of the Parchment. - Text. - Commentary. - Pp. 300-301: Appendix: List of Similarities between the Cons. Ber. and the DC and PV Traditions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Richard W. Burgess & Jitse H.F. Dijkstra, The Berlin 'Chronicle' (P.Berol. inv. 13296): A New Edition of the Earliest Extant Late Antique Consularia.
